vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding consideration of removing Section 51A-4.701(e) “Postponements” to eliminate the non-discretionary postponement process for zoning amendments and an ordinance granting the amendments
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval 
Recommendation of ZOAC:  Approval
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval 
DCA245-006(JP)
